compilerExecutable.description:
The executable path to the luac.cross compiler (i.e. "/opt/lua/esp8266/5.3/luac.cross"
or "C:\Temp\luac.cross.exe")

include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in LFS image. If no 'include' property is present in a NodeMCU task definition, the compiler defaults to including all .lua files under the './lfs' directory.

outDir.description: Specify an output folder for all emitted files. Default is './out'

outFile.description: Specify an output a flash image file. Default is 'lfs.img'
